      • byCreatedAt

        public Offer.Filter byCreatedAt(Date date,
                       Date endDate)
        Creates filter for createdAt date. If endDate is given the filter is set for range from date to endDate. If endDate is null the filter search for exact match.
        Parameters:
        date - Start or exact date
        endDate - End date for the period or null.
        Returns:
        Offer.Filter object with populated filter for createdAt.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When date is null.

      • byUpdatedAt

        public Offer.Filter byUpdatedAt(Date date,
                       Date endDate)
        Creates filter for updatedAt date. If endDate is given the filter is set for range from date to endDate. If endDate is null the filter search for exact match.
        Parameters:
        date - Start or exact date
        endDate - End date for the period or null.
        Returns:
        Offer.Filter object with populated filter for updatedAt.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When date is null.
